text:
@davidaxelrod @JoeBiden needs to start doing briefings with his #Pandemic task force.  Hire the fired Pandemic team that Trump disbanded, people who participated in #CrimsonContagion.  Love to see scientists able to share data without being censored. 

#covid19 #covid_19 #COVIDー19 #Taskforce
